The claim that Washington: D.C., Mayor Muriel Bowser ordered amenities in the city to be closed on Jan. 6, 2021, to prevent pro-Trump protesters from demonstrating.
The expert: s verdict stating that these claims are false.
The fact that Bowser: s order to pause various activities in D.C. was actually issued on Dec. 18, 2020, due to a surge in COVID-19 cases and had nothing to do with the protests.
Bowser: s statement asking D.C. residents to avoid the downtown area on Jan. 6, 2021, where protests were set to take place, and her announcement of increased security measures and police activation.
